title: Tesak1
author: Tesak1
content: I recently started working with the Exorde project and now I will tell you more about it.Exorde is a project that created a protocol to make the Internet cleaner and more truthful. Exorde is a web3 protocol that links a URL to its source.The project began in March 2020, at a time of aggravation with covid19, when our social relationships shifted almost entirely to the virtual world. At that time, the creators of the project realized that it was necessary to make sure that people received only truthful and correct information on the InternetThe Ambassador Programme at Exorde:EXD is the utility token of the Exorde protocol.All contributors can earn reputation and EXD, the cryptocurrency of the Exorde protocol.To earn project tokens you need to perform daily tasks and distribute the project on the Internet. This can be done as an "Ambassador" or "Bounty Hunter". The title of "Ambassador" must be earned and their number is limited, but "Ambassadors" get the opportunity to earn moreFor more information, visit the project website or social networks:https://discord.gg/8gfDEXGphttps://exorde.network/https://twitter.com/ExordeLabs
